Text:
Thank you for the upload. I was waiting for this :)

Cracking instructions pls?

OK, found instructions in file. Here they are for new downloaders:

                    - Install the program in the default directory

                    - Use our activator to register (as admin for Vista & 7) 
                    (!) Save the "Unity_v4.x" license file in the "ProgramData" folder:
                        For Win7
                        %systemdrive%ProgramDataUnity
                        For WinXP
                        %systemdrive%:Documents and SettingsAll UsersProgram DataUnity

                    - Enjoy your newly full registered app !


Any restrictions on the patch though? Can I still download assets and use the community normally, or will I face problems?

thx for di up !

Mayan Prophecy Team is doing - sometimes- a great work , i did upload a few crack from them ages ago and i am glad to see otherz piratz do too .

keep up the good work Anacondaz

im not sure if this is because its cracked but when you enable dx11 and try and run the standalone in fullscreen it doesnt work. not sure if my computer or the crack. but everything else works fine.
great crack

figured the problem. also not sure if cracks fault. standalone fullscreen doesnt work if you have msaa with dx11 enabled, but it doesnt really matter anyway cause msaa doesnt even work in defered lighting anyway.
great upload though.
I got a Virus warning. Any issues?
